sentences.en: "This ought to be fun," he told Alex, eyes gleaming.
sentences.cn: “这应该会很有趣！”他对亚历克斯说,两眼闪闪发光.

sentences.en: being stuck behind a desk all day &B{isn't my idea of fun}.
sentences.cn: 整天不能离开办公桌半步可不是好玩的。

sentences.en: Evelyn would tease her, but only in fun .
sentences.cn: 伊夫林会取笑她，但只是闹着玩的。

sentences.en: He had just come for the fun of it.
sentences.cn: 他来只是为了好玩。

sentences.en: I found myself having more fun than I had had in years.
sentences.cn: 我发现自己这些年来从未像现在这样开心过。

sentences.en: I'd make fun of her dress and imitate her speech.
sentences.cn: 我会拿她的衣着开玩笑，并模仿她说话。

sentences.en: it can't be much fun living next door to him.
sentences.cn: 与他为邻决非幸事。

sentences.en: Moe was having fun banging the drums and singing off-key.
sentences.cn: 莫自得其乐地一边敲着鼓，一边不成调地唱着歌。

sentences.en: My interests: eating out, fun nights in, music and laughter.
sentences.cn: 我的爱好是：到外面上馆子，晚上在家娱乐，听音乐，寻乐子。

sentences.en: remember when you meet the press to say that your speech was all in fun.
sentences.cn: 你和报界人士见面时别忘了说清楚你那次讲话只是闹着玩儿的。

sentences.en: She kept trying to inject a little fun into their relationship.
sentences.cn: 她一直在设法为他们的关系增添一些情趣。

sentences.en: She would have cracked up if she hadn't allowed herself some fun.
sentences.cn: 她若是没给自己找点乐趣的话，早就崩溃了。

sentences.en: Talking one-on-one with people is not his idea of fun.
sentences.cn: 他一点也不觉得一对一的交谈有趣。

sentences.en: teaching isn't all fun and games.
sentences.cn: 教学不是一天到晚搞有趣的活动。

sentences.en: The children were having so much fun, I hated to call them inside.
sentences.cn: 小孩子玩得很开心，我不忍心把他们叫进来。

sentences.en: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
sentences.cn: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

sentences.en: the mill is blazing away like fun.
sentences.cn: 工厂燃起迅猛的熊熊大火。

sentences.en: Their relationship is never short on fun and frolic.
sentences.cn: 他们在一起少不了欢乐和嬉戏。

sentences.en: There’s plenty of fun for all the family.
sentences.cn: 可以让全家人玩得很开心。

sentences.en: They neglect their duty at the least hint of fun elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 别处哪怕发生一丁点儿乐事，他们便会忘记自己的职责。

sentences.en: This is a fabulous album. It's fresh, varied, fun.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑真棒，新颖、有趣且富于变化。

sentences.en: Try snow-boarding -it’s a really fun sport.
sentences.cn: 试试单板滑雪——是个很好玩的运动。

sentences.en: Under all the innocent fun, there are hidden dangers, especially for children.
sentences.cn: 在所有简单无害的娱乐项目背后都隐藏着危险，特别是对儿童而言。

sentences.en: What started out as fun quickly became hard work.
sentences.cn: 起初好玩的事很快就变成了艰苦的工作。

phrases.tran_cn: 非常有意思；很大的乐趣
为了好玩儿，闹着玩儿地
寻找乐趣：开玩笑的；滑稽可笑的
有趣的活动，开心的玩乐
[口语]取笑(或嘲弄、奚落)某人，拿某人开玩笑

phrases.phrase: not much (或 a lot of) fun
phrases.tran_cn: ［用于表示对某事感到极为不快］
［用于表示不喜欢某事或嘲讽他人对某事的喜欢］

trans.tran_en: an experience or activity that is very enjoyable and exciting
